details.questions:

关于软件生命周期的描述以下哪项是对的？（）

details.options:
[{"Key":"A","Value":"

"},{"Key":"B","Value":"

It is quite common that requirements always change, which makes big trouble for development organization.

"},{"Key":"C","Value":"

"},{"Key":"D","Value":"

Some good software organizations can forecast the requirements of the potential users, so they can lead clients and users.

"}]

审查和走查是两种类型的（）。
